pullrequest.title: Find more stable release versions of zeromq on Windows

content.raw: If the ZeroMQ cmake support is that fresh, then let's keep things the way they are, including the use of `4_2_2`. I wouldn't want to put too much effort into handling edge cases. Instead, let's just look forward to the day that we can scrap the find-module, once we can safely require a minimum version of `4.2`.
